LanguageData.VFE_ComponentFabricationBench.label: малий стіл для виробництва
LanguageData.VFE_ComponentFabricationBench.descriptio: A workbench equipped with advanced tools to produce components.
LanguageData.VFE_ComponentFabricationBench_Frame.desc: A workbench equipped with advanced tools to produce components.
LanguageData.VFE_TableButcherElectric.label: електрична м'ясорізка
LanguageData.VFE_TableButcherElectric.description: A motorized table with a rotating saw blade for butchering dead creatures quicker into precise slices of raw meat. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableButcherElectric_Blueprint.label: electric butcher (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableButcherElectric_Frame.label: electric butcher (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableButcherElectric_Frame.descripti: A motorized table with a rotating saw blade for butchering dead creatures quicker into precise slices of raw meat. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableDrugLabElectric.label: електрична нарколабораторія
LanguageData.VFE_TableDrugLabElectric.description: An advanced work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs with more efficiency. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableDrugLabElectric_Blueprint.label: electric drug lab (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_TableDrugLabElectric_Frame.label: electric drug lab (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableDrugLabElectric_Frame.descripti: An advanced work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs with more efficiency. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_FueledSmelter.label: бензинова плавильна
LanguageData.VFE_FueledSmelter.description: A wood-fueled station for smelting. Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items.
LanguageData.VFE_FueledSmelter_Blueprint.label: fueled smelter (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFE_FueledSmelter_Frame.label: fueled smelter (building)
LanguageData.VFE_FueledSmelter_Frame.description: A wood-fueled station for smelting. Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items.
LanguageData.VFE_TableStonecutterElectric.label: електрична кам'яний різак
LanguageData.VFE_TableStonecutterElectric.description: An advanced work table with electrical saws and holders for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks in shorter duration of time on an assembly line. Consumes a lot of power.
LanguageData.VFE_TableStonecutterElectric_Frame.label: electric stonecutter's table (building)
LanguageData.VFE_TableStonecutterElectric_Frame.descr: An advanced work table with electrical saws and holders for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks in shorter duration of time on an assembly line. Consumes a lot of power.
